name: epub-to-pdf
title: EPUB to PDF Converter
description: Convert EPUB ebooks to PDF format with preserved formatting
content:
Overview

This application converts EPUB (electronic publication) ebooks into PDF format. Built using ebooklib and WeasyPrint, it extracts content from EPUB files and renders them as professional PDF documents.

Features

  • Convert EPUB to PDF format
  • Preserve text formatting and structure
  • Professional PDF output with proper margins
  • Support for embedded images

Parameters

  • EPUB File: Upload your EPUB file from stash
  • Output Directory: Select or create a stash folder for output

Output

The application generates a PDF file with the same base name as the input EPUB file in the specified output directory.

Use Cases

  • Converting ebooks for printing
  • Creating archival copies of digital publications
  • Reading ebooks on devices that don't support EPUB
  • Sharing ebook content in a universal format
command: rm -rf prod_apps && git clone https://github.com/CamberCloud-Inc/prod_apps.git && python prod_apps/python/epub_to_pdf.py "${epubPath}" -o "${outputDir}"
